_README.description: HAP's Learning Lab Template - Easter Egg Insights Data File
_README.format: JSON (not JSONC - no comments allowed in final file)
_README.usage: This file powers the HyBit easter egg system when students add ?hybit parameters to URLs
customization_steps: 1. Update allowedParams array with your parameter names (use kebab-case)
2. Create messages for each parameter (title + content)
3. Update pageHelp for each station with suggestions
security_notes: All content is pre-defined and sanitized
JavaScript validates parameters against allowedParams whitelist
User input is NEVER directly inserted into HTML

voice_guidelines.first_person: Always use HAP's first-person voice (I, me, my)
voice_guidelines.specific: Reference specific mistakes and learning moments
voice_guidelines.emoji: Start titles with relevant emoji (ðŸŽ¨, ðŸ”¬, ðŸŽ¯, etc.)

content_length.title: 3-8 words, start with emoji
content_length.content: 2-5 sentences, use HTML tags for formatting

examples.good_content: Prof. Teeters said "HSL is like having a color remote control" and she was SO right! Want a darker version? Keep H and S, just lower L!
examples.bad_content: HSL is a color format. It stands for Hue, Saturation, Lightness.

testing_checklist: All messages have title and content
All pageHelp suggestions reference valid parameters
Emoji render correctly in all browsers
Tested on actual pages with ?hybit= parameters
